page.title: 04LANGUAGES IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: Nearly all the children in Grove Road School were born in England, and we {all}speak{English.}However, there are over a{dozen other languages}spoken in our school, and this is because many of our parents were born in other countries. We compiled a questionnaire for our school, and the approximate results were:{India-31%; England-29%; {Kenya-16%; Bangladesh-15%.}The other parents came from various countries in{Asia, Africa, Europe}and{South {America.}We have made a list of the languages the children speak. We do not think we have missed any, but we are not sure about some of the spellings:{English, Urdu, Gujerati, {Punjabi, Hindi, Spanish, Malayalam, {Kachie, Thai, Mauritian, Arabic, {Gaelic}and{Greek.
